Title: Chicken Little
Genre: Animation, Adventure, Comedy, Family, Fantasy, Sci-Fi
Writer: Mark Dindal (story by), Mark Kennedy (story by), Steve Bencich (screenplay by), Ron J. Friedman (screenplay by), Ron Anderson (screenplay by)
Actors: Zach Braff, Garry Marshall, Don Knotts, Patrick Stewart
Plot: After ruining his reputation with the town, a courageous chicken must come to the rescue of his fellow citizens when aliens start an invasion.
